document.full_text: after gov. mitch daniels of indiana said he would not run for president, a debate began over whether there would be a candidate able to unseat president obama.
document.title: daniels is out, in another jolt to g.o.p. field
lines_and_colors: after gov. mitch daniels of indiana said he would not run for president, a debate began over whether there would be a candidate able to unseat president obama.
